news_header: Neo-Nazis marched in Berlin as protests against the far-right surge occurred ahead of Bundestag elections.
news_original_title: Jännittävä vaaliasetelma veti saksalaiset kaduille vaalien aattona – Yle seurasi mielenosoituksia
news_text: In Berlin, neo-Nazis marched while numerous counter-demonstrators protested against the far-right. This occurred on the eve of Germany's Bundestag elections, where the AfD party is gaining traction, potentially becoming the second largest party. Demonstrators chanted slogans like 'Get the Nazis out' and 'Choose democracy' as hundreds of protests against extremism unfolded across the country.
